name: Polysynth
introduce: Polysynth is a decentralised structured derivatives protocol for gaining from advanced crypto financial products in an innovative and user-friendly way. Polysynth aims to play an active role in the convergence of DeFi and TradFi, meeting every financial requirement with an all-encompassing suite of derivatives offering — Options, Perpetual Futures, Synthetic Assets and Prediction Markets. Polysynth launched DeFi Option Vaults makes it easier for investors to make the most out of options perpetually by abstracting all of the complexities of options and replacing them with a simple deposit and auto-compounding earning vault.
